name: ChlamydiaTrachomatisInfectionTestsForChlamydiaSpeciesByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Chlamydia trachomatis Infection (Tests for Chlamydia species by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Chlamydia species by culture and identification methods),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Chlamydia sp culture or isolate;  

LOINC search: 'Chlamydia sp (culture or isolate) -panel'),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
